author: "Heather E. Wheeler"
date: "August 5, 2016"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
fig.dir <- '~/GitHub/GenArch/GenArchPaper/Figures/'
"%&%" = function(a,b) paste(a,b,sep="")
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
pred.perf<-readRDS('~/Dropbox/Haky-2016/work.dir/pred.perf.for.heather.RDS')
pred.perf<-mutate(pred.perf,enR2=factor(R2>0.1,labels=c('\u2264 0.1','> 0.1')))
p<-ggplot(pred.perf %>% filter(!is.na(pLI) & tissue=='DGN_WB'),aes(x=pLI,fill= enR2)) + geom_density(alpha=0.6)+theme_bw(20)+ scale_fill_discrete(name=expression("EN R"^2)) + theme(legend.position=c(0.85,0.85))
p
png(filename=fig.dir %&% "pLI-by-R2.png",width=480,height=480)
p
dev.off()
```
